content:
The Honey Lime Dressing will complement the sweetness of the strawberries perfectly. Fresh strawberries are a great choice for a fruit salad, and they'll add natural sweetness and a pop of color to your dish.

To take your fruit salad to the next level, you might consider adding some other fruits that pair well with strawberries and the Honey Lime Dressing. Here are some suggestions:

1. **Pineapple**: The sweetness of the pineapple will complement the strawberries, and the tanginess of the lime juice will cut through the richness.
2. **Kiwi**: The tartness of the kiwi will balance out the sweetness of the strawberries, and the citrus flavor will tie everything together.
3. **Grapes**: Halved or quartered grapes will add a sweet and juicy texture to the salad, and their sweetness will pair nicely with the honey.
4. **Banana**: If you want to add some creamy texture, sliced or diced bananas will work well. They'll also add a touch of sweetness and a bit of tropical flavor.

Feel free to choose one, two, or all of these fruits to add to your salad. You can't go wrong with a classic combination like strawberries and pineapple, but the kiwi and grapes will add a nice twist.

What do you think? Are you going to add any other fruits to your salad, or will you keep it simple with just strawberries?
